elements.name: carsBoatsVehiclesDescription
elements.title: Description of asset
elements.description: Include the make, model and year.

elements.name: carsBoatsVehiclesValue
elements.title: Current value of asset
elements.description:
You may be the only owner of an asset, or you may be a joint owner. For assets that you jointly own, you must only put the value for the percentage that you own.
Provide the estimated market value, not the cost of replacement.
